headline: Acting Press Secretary/Spokesperson at U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE)
summary:
I am an experienced public affairs officer and spokesperson. I have worked on national press teams on a variety of issues including national defense, innovation, science & technology, law enforcement, human rights, and violence against women issues. I have worked as part of teams that integrate traditional media, web, and new media to bring organizations' messages to the public in an effective and relatable manner.

Specialties: spokesperson, media outreach, non-traditional media, public relations, crisis communication, government liaison, community relations and events

defaultPosition.description: Serve as national media team spokesperson for U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement issues.
defaultPosition.title: Acting Press Secretary

positions.description: Serve as national media team spokesperson for U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement issues.
positions.title: Acting Press Secretary

positions.description: Served as spokesperson for DOD's science & technology portfolio; supported several DOD agencies including DARPA, DTRA and Missile Defense Agency; led DOD's social media operations for 2+ years; conducted local, national and international media outreach on behalf of DOD.
positions.title: Spokesperson, Public Affairs, Office of the Secretary of Defense

positions.companyName: Office on Violence Against Women, U.S. Department of Justice
positions.title: Public Affairs Specialist
